body.p:
The PDU can be operated within the following environmental conditions:
Standard ambient operating temperature: 25°C (77°F).
Ambient operating temperature range: 0⁰C to 40⁰C (32⁰F to 104⁰F)
General operating conditions for transformer operation are according to IEEE C57.12.01 (most recent edition).
Relative humidity range: 0% to 95% non-condensing.
Maximum altitude 10,000 ft. The PDU is de-rated above 10,000 ft. For operations at heights above 3,300 ft., please contact the factory before ordering.
